patthana16.35:4.1: Sekkhaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasekkho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.35:4.3: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … āsevane cha … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.35:5.1: Sekkhaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasekkho nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.35:5.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
